Reviews.Title: “Disappointing to say the least”

Reviews.Content: weve stayed plenty hampton inns usual hotel staying someplace day dont expect 5 star expect hotels live brand theyre converted days inn hotel hot hit mean air conditioning hallways elevators save dollars horrible getting lobby rug hallway leading slice hotel smelled musty id expect super 8 motel noname definitely hampton inn stay
